EmailTemplate.name: Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary Webinar - Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Complimentary Webinar Sweet Billing Version 5.8 Preview
Join Product Manager Dan Voss for an advance preview of the new modules available in version 5.8, in addition to other enhancements yet to be released this year.
DATE: October 21, 2011
TIME: 1 PM Central l 2 PM Eastern l Noon Mountain l 11 AM Pacific
PRESENTER: Dan Voss, Product Manager
REGISTER: http://offers.tritech.com/SweetBillingVersion5.8Preview_Registration.html
Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communications Manager 800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121 l PH: 858.799.7000
